subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Steroids
Tests and Testing
lead_paragraph: Alexandre Vinokourov was barred from cycling for one year for doping. Vinokourov, from Kazakhstan, was barred by his country’s cycling federation, Vinokourov’s former Astana team said in a statement on its Web site. Vinokourov and his Astana teammates were forced out of this year’s Tour de France when he tested positive for a banned blood transfusion.
